summary: A Mecha inspired sword that kills your enemy with an electric shock {shock enchantment :p}
descriptionHtml:
Photon Edge sword details :
- Type : One handed Weapon
- Weight : 16
- Damage : 5
- Critical : 100
- Enchantments :
      * Summoned enemy demolecularization {Banish summoned :p}
      * Electric Shock  { Shock enchantment}
- Value : 2460

note :
* Sword Can be found in DragonSearch behind the jarl :p
* please Don\'t forget to give some feedback :p Thanks

=====================================================================================
Installation;

Please unzip the file and copy .esp and .bsa files in your skyrim Data folder :
for 64bit
[HDD Drive example C:]\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
or
for 32bit
[HDD Drive example C:]C:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
=====================================================================================
uninstall
you can uninstall this mod only by deleting the files :)
author: TechDiff
